author: Jennifer ruby
title: Brit Awards 2017: Katy Perry portrays Donald Trump and Theresa May as skeletons as one of her dancers falls off stage
text:
Brit Awards 2017: Katy Perry portrays Donald Trump and Theresa May as skeletons as one of her dancers falls off stage 
The pop superstar put on an eventful performance during Wednesday night's ceremony Wednesday 22 February 2017 22:45 GMT Click to followES Entertainment Statement: Katy Perry brings on skeletons that resemble Donald Trump and Theresa May PA 
Katy Perry decided to get political during her Brit Awards performance, portraying leaders Donald Trump and Theresa May as dancing skeletons. The pop superstar, who was a vocal Hillary Clinton supporter during the US elections, took a swipe at the President and the Prime Minister during Wednesday night’s ceremony. While performing her new single Chained to the Rhythm, two large skeleton puppets were brought out on stage. Identical? Theresa May and Donald Trump at the White House last month (PA) One wore a suit and red tie and the other wore a red skirt and jacket, identical to the outfits worn by the leaders when they met at the White House last month. 
As part of the dramatic routine, the skeletons appeared to hold hands before suddenly exploding. 
— D IE G O (@DiegoZoon) February 22, 2017 Katy Perry's backing dancer falling off stage oh I am weak, this is left shark all over again
